import React from 'react'; import './welcome.css'; import usecase from './usecase.png'; export default function welcome() { return (

Admin

1. Manage Users

  • Create new user account.
  • Edit user account.
  • Delete user account

2. Manage Courses

  • Create new course.
  • Update course name.

Teacher

1. Manage Questions

  • Create new question.
  • Edit question.
  • Delete question.

2. Manage Tests

  • View Test Details.
  • View Test Questions.
  • View of Student Attempts.
  • Download excel sheet of results.
  • Graphical representation of results.

3. Create New Tests

  • Create new test
    1. Enter basic test details
    2. Random Questions or Select Questions
  • Preview Test
    1. Start Test.
    2. End Test.

Student

1. Do Tests

  • View Test Details.
  • View Test Questions.
  • Answer the question.

2. View Result

  • View result.
  • View explanations.
); }
